,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5005L;SiGe, 5005L, 1486Z;3; ,,, 4-port USB hub controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = WesternDigital |defaultssid_regex = ^WesternDigital$ |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-ND13 |manuf_rev = A1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2013 |fccapprovdate = 04/12/2012 |estreldate = 06/14/2012 |estprice = 119.99 |upc = 718037786506 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B007KZQM9Q |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9380;AR9380-AL1A, PCT029.00C, 1147, KOREA; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "8WRGND13.2A1G" (board ID = wrgnd13 ['''Alpha Networks''' WRG-ND13]) is silkscreened on the board of a production unit. :This device is similar to the [[Western Digital My Net N600]] (w/ an '''Alpha''' board ID of '''wrgnd16''').. but the N600 omits the GbE switch (for the in-SoC switch) and uses AR9382 (2x2) instead of AR9380. The default SSID for both bands is '''WesternDigital'''. {{WiFiCert|WFA14119|06/26/2012}} ==Links of Interest== :[http://support.wdc.com/product/download.asp?groupid=1702&sid=178&lang=en '''GPL Source Code''' for the device] ===Wikis / third party firmware projects=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/wd/n750 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://ofmodemsandmen.com/supported.html Supported by '''ROOter'''] *[http://dl.eko.one.pl/gargoyle-pl/attitude_adjustment/ar71xx/ Development at eko.one.pl supporting '''Gargoyle'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://foro.seguridadwireless.net/openwrt/%28tutorial%29-openwrt-en-western-digitar-my-net-n50/ '''(Tutorial) OpenWrt en Western Digital My Net N750''' @ ''http://foro.seguridadwireless.net''] ===From the vendor=== *[http://wdc.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/9618/~/how-to-recover-a-my-net-router-from-a-failed-firmware-update ''How to recover a My Net Router from a failed firmware update'' on the '''WD Knowledge Base'''] :applies to the '''N600''', '''N750''', '''N900''' and '''N900 Central''' ===Other=== *[http://www.murphyschaos.com/2013/03/05/building-the-wd-my-net-n900-central-gpl-source/ '''Building the WD My Net N900 Central GPL Source''' on ''Murphy's Chaos''] :Per user comments, telnet credentials (@ telnet.php ?) for the device appear to be '''Alphanetworks''':''wrgnd13_wd_av'' *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31793-wd-wants-to-sell-you-routers '''WD Wants To Sell You Routers''' - ''SmallNetBuilder''] :$119.99 MSRP ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/westerndigital/westerndigital_mynetn750 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/western_digital/my_net_n750 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=46864 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The UART is accessible at the (handily populated) '''JP1'''. The pinout appears to be as follows... 
[TxD][GND][3.3]     [RxD]
                    (JP1 text)
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==

[[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== ====Misc. info==== The PCI ID of the on-board AR9380 is 168c:0030 (168c:a120). [[Category:English Documentation]]
